Malden.House at 72R Dane Street:
The House at 72R Dane Street in Somerville, Massachusetts is one of Somerville's oldest surviving structures.
The house was built around 1790 and features American colonial and Federal style architecture. 72R Dane Street is located on a small right-of-way off of Dane Street, which "was laid out in 1845 to provide a north-south link between Somerville Avenue and Washington Street." The buildings surrounding 72R Dane Street were largely constructed as working class tenement housing in the mid-nineteenth century.
